column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS :
#Text=I always wanted to know what the cemeteries are like there .
#Text=What the funerals are like there .
#Text=Are they like town meetings in a place where there is so much death ?
#Text=GT : The journalists define news and their editors want news ... .
#Text=DS : It fits a template .
#Text=GT : And the reporting out of Washington is the worst .
#Text=DS : The press is often cited for it 's laziness and for reporting any source without checking its accuracy .
#Text=GT :
#Text=The press in Washington got us into this war as much as the people that are controlling it .
#Text=They took information that was second-hand information , and they went along with it .
#Text=It was n't only the Judy Millers who got credit for being in the pocket of Ahmed Chalabi and Wolfowitz and the rest of those people .
#Text=All of them .
#Text=The New York Times bureau , not only Miller , but all of them .
#Text=They went along .
#Text=They do n't want to get off Air Force One ; they want to have access .
#Text=Also , you mentioned Floyd Abrams .
#Text=I would n't defend what he defended , this kind of sourcing that goes on .
#Text=These sources that lie ?
#Text=The New York Times allows such liars to affect news .
#Text=I 'll give you several examples : the story of the so-called Chinese spy , Wen Ho Lee , the guy who four or five years ago in Los Alamos was supposed to be a spy .
#Text=He was locked up with chains around his ankles .
#Text=That was leaked information , one of these celebrated reporters -- Risen , or something , was the guy .
#Text=The story about that Anthrax fellow in Maryland who was supposed to be identified the source of this anthrax .
#Text=Wrong .
#Text=The Duke Lacrosse players , we were told raped that girl ; the New York Times pushed it on their front page .
#Text=We did n't know the facts .
#Text=You use sources and identify , crucify people who never committed any wrong .
#Text=It turned out not true .
#Text=Then it 's too late .
#Text=It 's just like that whole period before the Iraq War .
#Text=That information -- it was leaked , coming in , publish it .
#Text=Saddam has an atomic bomb .
#Text=And they publish it .
#Text=They publish it and we do n't know the truth .
#Text=Journalists should withhold information like that .
#Text=On the Iraq War
#Text=What most bothers me are the college students – the worst generation is what I call them .

#Text=These college students are the worst and I 've been to a lot of campuses ... this year I was at the University of Pennsylvania and I was at the University of Alabama , and I 've been to a number of campuses this year and nobody cares about this war .
#Text=DS : Has the war affected you as a person ?
#Text=GT : I wish it had .
#Text=The war has n't affected America as a person .
#Text=The only ones affected are the 165,000 troops , relatives , kinfolk , cousins .
#Text=That 's all .
